mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_CTRCTBSSGMT (CTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, CONTRACTCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, MNGMTORGCODE, REPORTFLAG) values (#{CtrctBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ContractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RptDateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IDType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IDNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MngmtOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_CTRCTBSSGMT set INFRECTYPE = #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACTCODE = #{ContractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPTDATE = #{RptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPTDATECODE = #{RptDateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDTYPE = #{IDType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDNUM = #{IDNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MNGMTORGCODE = #{MngmtOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTFLAG = #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDEL = #{IsDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_CODE = #{MngmtOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO = #{CtrctBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select CTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, CONTRACTCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, MNGMTORGCODE, REPORTFLAG,ISDEL,SOURCESYS,ORG_CODE from PBCRS_REPORT_CTRCTBSSGMT where CTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO = #{CtrctBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select CTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, CONTRACTCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, MNGMTORGCODE, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_CTRCTBSSGMT
mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_CTRCTBSSGMTM (CTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, CONTRACTCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, MNGMTORGCODE, REPORTFLAG, ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS) select CTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, CONTRACTCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, MNGMTORGCODE,'0', ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS from PBCRS_REPORT_CTRCTBSSGMT where CTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO = #{CtrctBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
